content.query:
USE demoDB
GO

CREATE SCHEMA NYCTaxi
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE NYCTaxi.NYCTripSmall
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'lh-synapse-container/NYCTaxi/data',
    DATA_SOURCE = myDataSourceDb,
    FILE_FORMAT = parquetFileFormat
)
AS
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://lhadlsgen2storage.dfs.core.windows.net/lh-synapse-container/Data/NYCTripSmall.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
GO

SELECT * FROM NYCTaxi.NYCTripSmall
